collector:SoulHarvest.NAME: Soul Harvest
collector:SoulHarvest.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL Enemies. NL if Fatal, collector:Collect them. NL Exhaust.

collector:Contemplate.NAME: Contemplate
collector:Contemplate.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your collector:Collection. Put it in your hand.
collector:Contemplate.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards from your collector:Collection. Put it in your hand and Upgrade it.

collector:Miser.NAME: Miser
collector:Miser.DESCRIPTION: Retain cards that cost less then !M!.

collector:Bargain.NAME: Bargain
collector:Bargain.DESCRIPTION: Switch the Cost of 2 cards in your hand.
collector:Bargain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Switch the Cost of 2 cards in your hand.

collector:Consign.NAME: Consign
collector:Consign.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply collector:Soul_Snare equal to unblocked damage dealt.

collector:Fireball.NAME: Fireball
collector:Fireball.DESCRIPTION: Deal !collector:AltD! damage if Fatal, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

collector:Hellfire.NAME: Hellfire
collector:Hellfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply a random collector:Affliction X Times.
collector:Hellfire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and Apply a random *Ï€Upgraded collector:Affliction X Times.

collector:DarkSuffusion.NAME: Dark Suffusion
collector:DarkSuffusion.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL if this brings an enemy under !M! HP, collector:Collect them.

collector:Omen.NAME: Omen
collector:Omen.DESCRIPTION: Dealing Attack Damage to an enemy with 6 collector:Afflictions reduces them by 1 and they lose !M! HP.

collector:LuckyWick.NAME: Lucky Wick
collector:LuckyWick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.
collector:LuckyWick.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Exhaust.

collector:CrookedStaff.NAME: Crooked Staff
collector:CrookedStaff.DESCRIPTION: At the end of !M! turns, gain 12 Vigor.

collector:CrudeShield.NAME: Crude Shield
collector:CrudeShield.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

collector:CultistFeather.NAME: Cultist Feather
collector:CultistFeather.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength and Dexterity. NL Exhaust.

collector:DefectCore.NAME: Defect Core
collector:DefectCore.DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Plasma. NL At the start of each turn Channel !M! Random orb
collector:DefectCore.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel 1 Plasma. NL At the start of each turn Channel !M! Random orbs

collector:IroncladMask.NAME: IroncladMask
collector:IroncladMask.DESCRIPTION: Double your Strength. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust.

collector:LouseSegment.NAME: Louse Segment
collector:LouseSegment.DESCRIPTION: The next time you take attack damage, Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

collector:JarWormTooth.NAME: Jar Worm Tooth
collector:JarWormTooth.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

collector:SentryCore.NAME: Sentry Core
collector:SentryCore.DESCRIPTION: Place !M! card in your hand into collector:Stasis. NL Exhaust.

collector:SilentTrophy.NAME: Silent Trophy
collector:SilentTrophy.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add 2 *Shivs to your hand. NL Exhaust.
collector:SilentTrophy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Intangible. NL Add 2 Upgraded *Shivs to your hand. NL Block is not removed at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

collector:SlimeSample.NAME: Slime Sample
collector:SlimeSample.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Card. NL Add 1 *Slimed to your hand. NL Exhaust.
collector:SlimeSample.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Add 1 *Slimed to your hand. NL Exhaust.

collector:StrangeFungus.NAME: Strange Fungus
collector:StrangeFungus.DESCRIPTION: Apply 1 Vulnerable. NL Gain !M! Temporary Strength. NL Exhaust.

collector:VialofOoze.NAME: Vial of Ooze
collector:VialofOoze.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! collector:Goop. NL Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust.

collector:WatchersStaff.NAME: Watchers Staff
collector:WatchersStaff.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Enter Wrath or Calm. NL Gain !M! Energy. NL Exit your Stance Next Turn.
